name: Unorthodox Approach
text: When this objective is revealed, attach a secret objective from the deck to this card. This objective has the requirements of the attached objective.

name: Evolve Synergy
text: When this objective is revealed, attach 2 Stage I public objectives from the deck to this card. This objective has the requirement of both of the attached objectives.

name: Acquire Wherewithal
text: Control 4 planets outside your home system that each have a resource value of 2 or more.

name: Gather Abundance
text: Control 6 planets outside your home system that each have a resource value of 2 or more.

name: Conduct Military Parade
text: Have non-fighter ships with a combined cost of 15 or more in 1 system.

name: Look On My Works, Ye Mighty, And Despair
text: Have non-fighter ships with a combined cost of 24 or more in 1 system.

name: Engage Provinces
text: Exhaust 3 planets outside your home system.

name: Exploit Colonies
text: Exhaust 5 planets outside your home system.

name: Launch Contact Network
text: Control 4 planets outside your home system that each have an influence value of 2 or more.

name: Institute Institute
text: Control 6 planets outside your home system that each have an influence value of 2 or more.

name: The Final Frontier
text: Remove 3 of your cruisers from the game board.

name: To Boldly Go
text: Remove 6 of your cruisers from the game board.
